name: Scrim: halal edition
description:
game made using rpg maker, contains an installer with RTP inside so dont worry about that stuff :))

HERE ARE THINGS YOU WILL EXPERIENCE WHEN U PLAY THIS:

-very THRILLING ACTION

-Super epic OST made by us and our extremely large intellect

-SUPER EPIC default rpg maker textures and some made by some dudes on the web

-incredible heartwarming storytelling about the journey of a chicken and his meaningless in the world... EPIC!!!!

-cringe secret ending!!!!!! very good indeed

-very bad words

-you can play it on your WINDOWS PC COMPUTER YES

-very good overall

-religion

-ok thats all play it now

if you for some reason wanan support this game just buy the ost or something lol https://thelittlefishsaid.bandcamp.com/album/scrim-ost
